title: Nero General Clean Tool
description:
Use Nero General CleanTool to delete all remaining Nero entries from your system.

Please proceed as follows:

Download the Nero General CleanTool, save this file to your desktop. Unzip the ZIP-file with WinZip or WinRAR and save the content to your hard drive. Reboot your computer. The Nero General CleanTool has removed all selected Nero entries from your computer.
